summary: The diff implements a fixed Google Drive APK download handler and updates Hero/Final CTA buttons to use it, and removes AdminPanel from the main App render path. However, the repo still contains landing-page-related components described as rendering mockup images and reading image paths from localStorage, which conflicts with the “no images/mockups” requirement if those components/sections are still reachable. Additionally, several style/polish changes appear beyond the requested scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove all images and mockups from the landing page UI so the page renders with no image assets (no phone mockups, no showcase images, no UI screenshots).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary indicates at least two landing-page components still implement image/mockup rendering behavior (including phone screenshots and feature mockup images). If these sections/components are still part of the landing page render tree, the landing page would still use image assets, violating the requirement/AC.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified substantial visual polish and new aesthetic effects (cursor glow overlay, glassmorphism styling, particle/canvas background tuning, premium CTA animations) beyond removing images/admin panel and fixing the APK link.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on removing Admin Panel, removing images/mockups, fixing a single APK link, and updating docs; it does not request additional new UI effects or aesthetic enhancements.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/retained React Query QueryClientProvider wrapping the app (and ThemeProvider adjustments) without an explicit request.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for data-fetching state management/provider changes; it only specifies UI removals and a fixed URL.
